snippet: Behind garage doors in Denver, Truex’s racing team has done everything in its power to prepare Truex and his No. 78 Chevrolet for the opportunity to win the Sprint Cup Championship.
abstract: Martin Truex Jr of Furniture Row Racing, single-car operation based out of auto shop in Colorado Rockies, will compete in Ford EcoBoost 400, hoping to ultimately capture Sprint Cup Championship.
lead_paragraph: Behind garage doors in Denver, Truex’s racing team has done everything in its power to prepare Truex and his No. 78 Chevrolet for the opportunity to win the Sprint Cup Championship.

headline.main: Martin Truex Jr. Embraces a Shot at Nascar’s Championship
headline.print_headline: One-Car Team From Out West Embraces a Shot at Nascar’s Season Title
